description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of
attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect
and Detect. This attack lowers the user’s Defense.
description.sun-moon:
Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of
attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect
and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of
attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect
and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of
attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect
and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.
description.sword-shield:
Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of
attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect
and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Bypasses and removes any protection effect on the target.
